titleStmt.title: W. Brown et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG7320

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Nicholasville Ky. Novr 27th 1865
His Excelllency Thomas. E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky.
Sir.

Mr William Rutherford was fined at the last Sept Term of the Jessamine Circuit Court fifty dollars for carrying concealed weapons ^assault and breach of the peace^ and execution for that amount and thirteen dollars ninety five cents for costs has issued against him. Whereas there are strong mitigating circumstances in the case we believe the case to be one fit for the executive clemency and we respectfully petition you to remit so much of said fine as you have the athority to do by law.

Yours Respectfully,
W. Brown
J, S, Bronaugh
F Woodson
J, C, Randolph

Jessamine Cir Ct
vs
Wm Rutherford
$50
Assault
2d Dec/65
